text: KƒÅbul (, ) is one of the thirty-four provinces of Afghanistan. It is in eastern Afghanistan, The capital of the province is Kabul City, which is also the country's capital. There are about 3.5 million people living in the province as of 2009. == Districts == Districts of Kabul Province District Capital Population Area Ethnic data (%)Ethnic demographic statistics taken from http://www.aims.org.af Notes Bagrami Bagrami 85,000 Pashtuns (majority) Tajiks Chahar Asyab Qalai Naeem 32,500 Pashtuns, Tajiks and few HazaraUNHCR Sub-Office Central Region - District Profile - Char Asiab (PDF) Retrieved on 2011-1-22. Surobi Surobi 150,000 90% Pashtuns and the rest are Pashais UNHCR Sub-Office Central Region - District Profile - Sarobi (PDF) Retrieved on 2011-1-22. == Sports == Kabul is the center of annual buzkashi and football tournaments. == Related pages == * Kabul == References == Category:Kabul Province
